greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 4 sequence [ 1, 2, 3, 2, ...].
comment: Continued fraction expansion of (2+sqrt(14))/4. - _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 01 2010
The sequence is like a sawtooth wave of period 4. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 13 2011
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, -1, 1).
formula: Moebius transform is length 4 sequence [2, 1, 0, -2]. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 13 2011
a(n) = a(-n) = a(n+4) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 17 2015
2 * a(n) = A164356(n) unless n=0. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 17 2015
xref: Cf. A177033 (decimal expansion of (2+sqrt(14))/4). - _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 01 2010
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 01 2002
